website_summaries.verdict: A stylish addition to your bathroom that's easy to install.
pros: We love the paper template that makes the installation nearly fail-proof
At 23-inches long, this shelf provides ample space for bathroom vanities
Customers appreciate how the glass upgrades the overall look of a space
cons: Not the best option for those who hate cleaning dust, fingerprints, etc

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shelf itself, but the way the fixture actually installs on the wall is terribly designed! No matter how many times my husband tried to mount it on the wall it was not secure! We decided to cut out a small piece of wood (from the craft store), and cut it to fit the mounting bracket, then my husband mounted it on the wall, and then mounted the shelf bracket onto the wood, which gave the mounting a much firmer base. I bought three of these shelves, and will be mounting them all this same way! I hope this tip helps others who want the shelf to be mounted securely!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice...but flawed design.
customer_reviews.text: Update 9/26/19 After 3 yrs my shelf started to look like it was ready for come crashing down. So I went to Lowe's this morning & bought a shelf bracket for extra support (see 2nd pic).I was not confident when installed this shelf bcuz of the design flaw. There was not enough support and it was leaning down. But it lasted 3 yrs. First review 2016 Very nice shelves, I love the design but like other customer complaints... I don't like how it can't be screwed up against the wall, it leaves a gap on the top screws. I'm not comfortable putting too much weight on it.
customer_reviews.author: HMC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was perfect for my guest bathroom. It was very easy to install. It came with a paper template to allow you to drill the mounting holes in the perfect locations. This shelf is very sturdy and elegant. The quality is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: JNam

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed a shelf in my daughter's bathroom and the finish matched her faucet. The first package came with a defective bar, so I called the company requesting a replacement part, but received no replacements, not even a return phone call. I requested a return of defective part to Amazon and they immediately replaced the unit. Amazon 10 stars, Organize it all 0 stars. Shelf is sturdy on the wall if installed properly and does look very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nitty's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Poor instructions and manufacturing quality
customer_reviews.text: The product's instructions are hysterically bad. It's the equivalent of a package contents list then "do stuff." Only 1 step has actual words on it and the rest are zoomed-out drawings. The worst part, however, was that my brackets didn't have the screw holes all the way drilled thru. They were only partially drilled; I had to come behind and drill thru my own holes. Overall it's an okay product, but maybe more in the $12 range.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shelf above shower
customer_reviews.text: I currently have a fiberglass shower with no room to set anything down except on the floor of the shower. I found this and it has been a lifesaver. I installed this right above the top of the shower where the drywall and fiberglass meet. It has help up for over a year and a half with no problems. Since it is tempered glass it is very easy to clean. It is also very easy for anyone who uses the shower to see what is on the shelf. I highly recommend this if you are needing more shelf space for your shower.
customer_reviews.author: C.K.Bigby

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks in my bathroom, I hung it up on dry wall but did not us the wall anchors since I don't own a drill, it seemed to hold up really well , I just hope it won't fall off due to that. I had a rack over the toilet that took up to much space so I bought both the towel rack and this too save space, came out perfect
customer_reviews.author: cindy loza

customer_reviews.title: Totally Happy.... Except for a Couple of Minor Issues
customer_reviews.text: These glass shelves look wonderful! The glass is tempered and super thick. The reason for docking one star is the installation. The template is not completely accurate and the rail doesn't allow the brackets to fit completely flush to the wall. I used the included mounting hardware and if I had to do it over I would take the time to go and purchase better mounting hardware. The nickel color is spot on and everything seems to be high quality except for the items mentioned above. Great value for some nice shelving if you need it!
customer_reviews.author: RDSWY4

customer_reviews.title: Flaw in finish
customer_reviews.text: The finish was flawed. There was an obvious line down the front of our bar, one side was very streaky and multi-toned, while the other half of the bar was how I expected. Now we need to return it and try again next weekend to see if we can get it installed. We did try cleaning it and polishing it, but it is an actual flaw in the finish and not just a residue.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in California

customer_reviews.title: Review the installation instructions.
customer_reviews.text: The product is so good. The instructions need to be explained better. The small mounting plate that is supposed to be installed in the back of the unit should be stated that the screw hole which has the drill hole with the indentation needs to be on the outside or the screw will be too short.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Mounting tip!!
customer_reviews.text: As you will see in other reviews, the shelf does not sit flush because of how it is mounted to the wall. This is easily solved with the correct anchors. DO NOT USE the cheap anchors provided. I got a box of self-drilling anchors that are made to hold 50 lbs in drywall. A box of 50 anchors and screws only costs about $8 and solved the problem. It's a beautiful shelf once the issue is fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: The designer of this mounting bracket must have gone to a strange engineering school The bracket was fine except there was no way to anchor the top of the bracket to the wall. So that left only the botton screw as an anchor. No good. To make matters worse the two screws for clamping the rail were too small and one of the screws to anchor the shelf was missing entirely. Good God what ever happened to quality control? Ramon Schaller
customer_reviews.author: R.E.Schaller

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf, terrible screws and anchors
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shelf, terrible screws and anchors. As another poster noted, the screws do not expand the anchors so it is not secure on the wall. It would not take much to pull it off. I'm not in love with the idea of a glass shelf being so insecure and a risk of falling. Now I have holes in my wall and I have to figure out a solution. It's a "make it work" moment.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Alfieri

customer_reviews.title: some parts are missing, overall it was okay
customer_reviews.text: Some of the parts mentioned in the manual are missing. It was very funny that the package didnt include the small rings that go onto the screw. I had to buy these additional parts from a local store. Otherwise it was okay to install. The product looks okay overall but mounting system has some flaws inherently i.e there is only one screw at the bottom which goes into the wall. Ideally there should be another screw at the top which goes into the wall but it is not there. So, the system is mounted only one side, so, the shelf swings/sway slightly.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran

customer_reviews.title: the timinator
customer_reviews.text: Took a little while to get it installed right but the end result looks very nice. I installed this behind my bar as a small shelf for shot glasses so the rail was what sold it and does the job
customer_reviews.author: the timinator

customer_reviews.title: Crappy hardware Install
customer_reviews.text: The mounting hardware is not like other shelves/towel bars. It hangs off of two screws while you mount it to two others. Because of the weight, it pulls the top screws away from the wall. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Haetinger-Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhh
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy the shelf. Not for the sturdiness .. but because the mounting doesn't match up with the studs in the wall. I bought 2 & they're sitting in my basement on a shelf. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Very poor mounting system, do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: My experience with this shelf has not been a positive one. The mounting brackets are a poor design and even with fiddling for a while, it's difficult to get the shelf to hang 90° to the wall. I bought 2 and both are drooping, and I don't trust them to hold anything. I will be replacing them immediately. Also, the finish on the brackets was different, one was chrome and the other a brushed look. Overall this is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Diane T.

customer_reviews.title: leans off the wall a little
customer_reviews.text: It is a cool shelf. What other respondents are saying is true. The directions do not work. For mine anyways, there are four screws provided (and four screws would surely benefit!), but there are only two screw holes (one on each side of the shelf). I can only drill one hole per clamp to the wall. The other two screws provided are useless. It still connects to the wall okay, but it does lean a little, and every few months it is good to re-tighten the screws. Again it is a good shelf, I just wish it connected better to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Tankersley

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shelf. I had a bit of trouble mounting it because the dry wall is brittle at my house. Nevertheless, I mounted it up above my shower and use it to hold all my shampoos and things. It is very sturdy and can hold a lot. Absolutely PERFECT for what I needed. Mine did come with the paper guide to help you drill holes which I really, really appreciated having.
customer_reviews.author: Romanos

customer_reviews.title: Metal tarnished, bracket not square
customer_reviews.text: Once I had drilled holes in walls and began to hang I realized there were tarnishes on the metal, the bracket was minorly crooked, and pulled away from wall because metal was not square. Cheap so I just left installed because i just rent.
customer_reviews.author: bryan

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use above a pedestal sink to afford my quests extra space for tooth brushes, tooth paste etc. It's both attractive and functional. It comes with a template to know where to put the screws and makes it super easy and convenient to mount.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Mounting's a little confusing, but once you get it up, it's a nice addition to the bathroom, etc. My wife puts all her hair products on it.
customer_reviews.author: RJ (Bob A)

customer_reviews.title: This shelf is poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: This shelf sags down in the front and it is impossible to install it in a level position due to poor design. I would like to return it. Please tell me how to return this item since it doesn't allow me to .
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Crecelius

customer_reviews.title: Additional storage for small bathroom
customer_reviews.text: Great shelving unit for small bathroom with limited space. Obviously it's not meant for a lot of heavy items but it holds a decent amount of stuff, as long as it is securely and properly mounted.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little shelf
customer_reviews.text: I little hard to install/mount but after a year, the glass is still in place and the shelf holds a decent amount of cosmetics, etc. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking but almost impossible to hang
customer_reviews.text: I've had this on and off my wall at least five times. The bracket system is an engineering mess. ake sure you have a good helper and larger screws with expanding sleeves or mollys'
customer_reviews.author: Robert S

customer_reviews.title: Nice shelf
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a replacement shelf. Some of the screws didn’t thread well, but I was still able to install it.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: It tilts forward a bit.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good looking shelf, but due to the design of the mounting bracket, it won't sit level and tends to tilt forward. Can't seem to fix that.
customer_reviews.author: John Lewis

customer_reviews.title: A
customer_reviews.text: works well and just as described. I installed it myself without help.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: I think it looks great! Installation was not too bad
customer_reviews.text: I think it looks great! Installation was not too bad. One suggestion is to make sure the two bracket pieces that are to hold the glass are actually horizontal (check that the bracket is straight before and during screwing). I think when I was putting the last screw in, it shifted a little and I had some trouble getting the glass in.
customer_reviews.author: shakar

customer_reviews.title: Pretty design
customer_reviews.text: This was a little tricky to install. However, it looks nice over the pedestal sink in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love this shelf
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf ...used it in the kitchen and the metal matches beautifully. Chose this one due to wrap around metal trim that holds items on the shelf......beautiful quality.
customer_reviews.author: P Schoenberg

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and handy addition to a small bathroom. High quality shelf. Easy to mount—-follow the instruction sheet and use the provided template for mounting hole location. I just ordered another in a smaller size for the other wall.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: Installation
customer_reviews.text: How on earth to hang No instructions Only a wall template Still trying to attach upon the top screws
customer_reviews.author: vera

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy product.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Easy, basic install. Holds adequate amount of weight.
customer_reviews.author: chad b

customer_reviews.title: You have to be a rocket scientist to figure out ...
customer_reviews.text: You have to be a rocket scientist to figure out how to mount this on the wall and have it level. The directions are no help at all, so be prepared to do a lot of math.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Doc

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these shelves to hold all of my hair supplies, perfume, and nail polish. They are beautiful and very sturdy. My husband had zero problems getting them installed, and there are no gaps like other people complain about. I'll be buying more for my other bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Katy95

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my bathroom, works for what I needed it for. Mounted it below my mirror above my sink to sit skin care and toothbrushes on. Came in perfect condition. Very easy to put together and hang up.
customer_reviews.author: Nova

customer_reviews.title: A nice shelf once you figure out how the heck to ...
customer_reviews.text: A nice shelf once you figure out how the heck to hang it. The screws that came with it, did not fit the pre-drilled holes. The instructions were terrible and the pieces they wanted me to use didn't even come with the shelf. I had to ask a more handy friend to help me hang this one. Once it is placed properly it is a very nice shelf. Looks very nice in a modern bathroom. I am enjoying it much more now that it's installed...finally!
customer_reviews.author: Rayne

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY.
customer_reviews.text: STOP SENDING CHEAP SCREWS! Everything about this is cheap &$@! made in some cheap country. I'd prefer to pay twice this and have a product that wasn't complete garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Ahzelton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shelf, but a little tricky on the installation. The top hole is not used. Just disregard that one when drilling; you won't need it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hatton

customer_reviews.title: Helps reduce counter clutter
customer_reviews.text: Nice & weighty so it's sturdy enough to hold shower items & lotions for guests in my guest bathroom. Tricky to hang (the stencil needed to drill the holes was missing!) but after some engineering on my husband's part (and a few choice words...) we got it hung, and it looks terrific in my bathroom with satin nickel finish fixtures.
customer_reviews.author: Corvette

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wall Mounted Glass Shelf
customer_reviews.text: This wall mounted glass shelf looks fantastic and it is very functional especially with the band around the edge of the shelf. Care should be taken in installing but it is not difficult. My wife says that is is one of my best looking projects. It looks like the shelf in a high-end hotel. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: E. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: We ordered two of these. After my husband could not get our drill to penetrate the tile (even with a new bit) we hired someone to install them. I loved the way they looked, but one of them has developed significant rust. So I do not think I would recommend placing them in a shower area.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Santucci

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I just love this in my bathroom. It looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: For charm and style
customer_reviews.text: Installed above toilet to add s little extra space. Just a little decoration for the holidays and then I can replace with candles, floral arrangement, napkins, just about anything to make the space sizzle.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Mounting design is terribly flawed
customer_reviews.text: Mounting design is terribly flawed. Mounting it securely in drywall is absolutely impossible. Sags horrible before you even put the glass shelf in. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carley Brasier

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: once you get the instructions down it is a great item. template was great the thing of picture only instruction works 90 percent of the time. You would think developer who had this product and brought it to market would give a little more thought to instructions, but like I said once you do one it is a breeze. bought another one right away had it up in 3 mins. great item.
customer_reviews.author: screwed consumer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product and Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I'm very pleased with this product, it appears nicely made/finished and is very reasonably priced. The only caveat I would mention is you should probably be well versed in using hieroglyphic instructions as there is little written about installation, shouldn't be any problem for experienced DIYers but just throwing it out there. Looks GREAT mounted to the wall and as I've said, very reasonably priced for this level of quality.
customer_reviews.author: PaulG

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf, i will buy another for my other bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Valerie  Baral-Baron

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and strong
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price a bit tricky to install but you can do it , two heads are better than one my son helped me figure it out .Once up they look awesome and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Marco Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Tapers
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for 2 years. Sturdy, doesn’t rust and looks good. However, one of them tapers do much I don’t put any more perfumes on it. This is despite being connected to one stud and careful installation
customer_reviews.author: SleepyInSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Simple and excellent
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this shelf. Easy to install and very attractive. My wife and I have installed a few of these type of glass shelves and, it sounds so obvious, but the railing is incredibly worthwhile and not as common as you might think. Not much to say about it - glass is thick and well formed without flaw. Instructions were simple and installation took maybe 15 minutes with simple tools. Priced right too.
customer_reviews.author: Joe O

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t decide on a color - so the glass was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This shelf looks great in my powder room. The template they provided was not accurate but hubby was able to mount it without much difficulty. I planned on using a white shelf but the look wasn’t what I wanted; this shelf is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Another AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Nice touch for small baths.
customer_reviews.text: We got one of these for each bathroom and mounted them just under the medicine cabinet. They are great for all those things that usually clutter up the sink, or just for a nice candle and vase of flowers. They really dress up the paths.
customer_reviews.author: P. Penwood

customer_reviews.title: Do not order...poor instructions
customer_reviews.text: I got everything on the wall with no clear instructions or temp plate. I went to put the glass in and tighten the screws for the glass. The screw was all the way through the metal bracket and shelf wasn't secure. Highly dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Luchsinger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for some extra storage under the medicine cabinet in ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Perfect for some extra storage under the medicine cabinet in a small guest bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Bananabread

customer_reviews.title: Enclosed Instructions not for this shelf
customer_reviews.text: Ordered and it arrived in short time, but instructions are for a completely different shelf. This is going in a bathroom, by a sink, so did not want to install it incorrectly. Sent it back and requested another, hoping it was a glitch. Nope. Got another with the same wrong instructions. Sent back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Boarini

customer_reviews.title: looks amazing in my client's kids bathroom
customer_reviews.text: well done item ..looks amazing in my client's kids bathroom!!
customer_reviews.author: sophia ro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition
customer_reviews.text: It really is a nice piece for my newly remodeled bathroom. The rail gives me comfort that things won't fall off and break. Could be a little deeper but it seems that most bathroom shelves are about that dimension. The reason that I did not give it a 5 star is because the satin nickel finish on the rail came pretty scratched. Everything else is fine. I called the distributor on the instructions that came with it. They sent me out another one right away with no hassle. It definitely is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: twinkle star

customer_reviews.title: Could be a lot better
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this up and it almost fell off the wall. Needs to have better instructions on how to hang this shelf. Yes, he does know how to install shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Schnittker

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy fixture except that it doesn’t align to the wall ...
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy fixture except that it doesn’t align to the wall and the instruction is unclear - use template? I end up having to repatch my holes. (You’ll need to use #8 piece to measure out the hole distance, from the top hole to the bottom.)
customer_reviews.author: M. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, NOT cheap quality. Has a paper line for easy hole drilling and perfect match. Overall - worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Danila Pozdeev

customer_reviews.title: Classy, simple, elegant
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my bathroom, which has limited storage. They are very well made, easy to install with a little thought, and are simple and elegant. I love them so much I just ordered two more!
customer_reviews.author: D. Eason

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shelving at fair price
customer_reviews.text: This product is such a good deal...it is so clean and simple on the wall. I bought 2 of them and have one over the other. What a nice addition to my newly done-over bathroom! They are solidly put together, and the glass is tempered. The railings are a good height to prevent things from falling off. Our contractor installed them so I can't speak of the ease of installation. He didn't seem to have any trouble though. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, but a bit heavy for the anchors included!
customer_reviews.text: This is great quality and very well made. It was very easy to install. The only comment I have is that when I held the entire assembled unit on my hands, I thought that it was too heavy for the anchors you receive if installing on drywall. I used some heavy duty anchors I had in hand instead.
customer_reviews.author: FriscoM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed this in our bathroom for my colognes. Look awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: I love the Shelf because it's pretty but a little Troublesome ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the Shelf because it's pretty but a little Troublesome to set up that is why I gave it a 3-star but if you have excess stuff in your bathroom and you need extra space shelf worth it
customer_reviews.author: glen

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf!!!! It lost a star due to mounting issues- we had to use some extra hardware to reinforce but other then that I love, love, love this shelf!! It is the perfect fit and the perfect look- I'll be ordering another!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Terrible mounting design, difficult to install, No access to top mounting screw so the shelf brackets do not sit flat and securely against sheet rock...must hit studs to have a chance of securing this shelf.
customer_reviews.author: LukeO

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shelf - easy installation
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely little shelf that was super easy to install. The manufacturer provides you with a guide for drilling attachment holes, so there is no guess work.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know about durability, because I’ve only had it for a while. But it was easy to setup and it looks good!
customer_reviews.author: John Piper

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this glass shelf. It is perfect behind out bathroom stool. It looks so classy and all the items I sit on it stay in place. It was easy for my hubby to install too. The perfect answer to small storage in a cramped space. You will not be disappointed if you order this shelf.
customer_reviews.author: gail l heiken

customer_reviews.title: They look fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: Shopped around a lot - glass shelves are expensive. These were very similar to some I saw at a high end store but at a third of the price. They look fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: supper cute
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble hanging, but did use stronger anchors than the one's provided. i put it between my sink facet and the mirror in the powder room that also has a shower. it's nice when people are staying over to have somewhere to put their make-up and tooth brushes. very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: purple lady

customer_reviews.title: Shelf Falling
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 shelves and 2 out of 3 are already sagging down. We've tried to rescrew it into the wall but the glass shelf keeps drooping down. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took us a little time to figure out how to ...
customer_reviews.text: Took us a little time to figure out how to mount- instructions were pictures and not too clear. But once up, it looks great
customer_reviews.author: TCreilly

customer_reviews.title: I returned and agree with the one-star rating
customer_reviews.text: This item had a good star rating but like a lot of the comments that were posted for the poor reviews I have to agree not the correct hardware and shelf was very flimsy
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Screws do not fit, they are too thin so it is impossible to assemble this
customer_reviews.text: The small screws marked part #4 in the manual do not fit into the part marked #3 as it is supposed to. In addition, the template is off on the measurement. Returning. Sad because I was excited to hang these today.
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: these shelfs are nice and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: these shelfs are nice and easy to install, just need a few tools. i've loaded mine up with many many toiletries .
customer_reviews.author: renzo gamarra

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Put this above my laundry sink. Looks nice and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sigi

customer_reviews.title: Bit of a trial to put together
customer_reviews.text: Nice seem to be well made. Would have given them 5 stars but my husband as hsndy as he is and he IS had difficulty. The included template is not accurate!!
customer_reviews.author: Grammashe

customer_reviews.title: This product was damaged, I returned it, but I have not gotten the credit
customer_reviews.text: Upon installing this shelf, the glass could not hold in place. So I returned the item, but I have not received the credit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this looks great nut the glass shelf is to heavy for the small clips a waist of money
customer_reviews.author: shirley koberstein

customer_reviews.title: Easy to mount and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: As the title says this shelf was pretty easy to mount and is pretty sturdy. We bought it for out kids bathroom to give them a place to keep some items while keeping them off the counter. We've yet to run into any issues since installing it.
customer_reviews.author: Bloose

customer_reviews.title: Needs better screws
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is nice and well built but the screws etc are not big enough to keep it tight and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Meof

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: really nice look. need to measure and level carefully and get everything nice and tight.
customer_reviews.author: smac

customer_reviews.title: perfec solution
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly easier to install than I expected,also much more solid and secure than I expected.Perfect solution for me
customer_reviews.author: robert stlawrence

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just love my glass shelf I put it in my bathroom and it looks so nice in there.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Simple, elegant, and well made
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I run a small resort. I ordered one of these to see how well we liked it. It arrived promptly. It's simple, elegant, and well made. It looks like it will hold up to abuse. I'm fortunate in that the wall I mounted it to has 3/4" wood backing so there was no problem with getting the top screw to hold it securely, and the bottom screw to cinch it up tight against the wall. I just placed an order for enough of these shelves to put one in each suite.
customer_reviews.author: CKeen

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at how nice this shelf actually is. I ended up installing it in the shower. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: John VerboseOne

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with proper installation hardware
customer_reviews.text: The screws that came with the shelves were not long enough for a proper mount. We had to take the shelves to hardware store and purchase additional screws.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Cole

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my bathroom remodel and looks good and are extremely useful in a small room.
customer_reviews.author: oldth2

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, better looking than I though, easy set up! Had it for a few months now even decided to get another.
customer_reviews.author: AntMan2000me

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is great - contains all of my husband's bathroom effects that for some reason never find their way back to his drawer :) It looks much more expensive than it was. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JCMCR

customer_reviews.title: You'll hate it while putting it up, but love it when it's finally up.
customer_reviews.text: Total pain in the rear end to mount, but looks great up. Looks high end for the price. Don't bother spending more on a fancy brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: sturdy shelving
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the bathroom for all my girl stuff. Love it
customer_reviews.author: mhaas

customer_reviews.title: Know parts
customer_reviews.text: Just finish bathroom went to put up and there was know parts with it just the glass and railing , need parts
customer_reviews.author: carol maslanka

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and attractive shelf. Very easy to assemble and hang.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Landavaso

product_meta.title: Organize It All Wall Mounting Glass Shelf with Nickle Finish and Rail
product_meta.description: This Glass Shelf with Rail is the perfect choice for cosmetic and toiletry storage. The rail ensures that products and personal care items will stay on the shelf and not end up on the floor. The glass adds a perfect touch to the aesthetic of any bathroom while the shelf's function makes organization much more simple. Organize your bathroom essentials with style!
feature_bullets: Durable, sturdy glass permits storage of bathroom essentials
Railing ensures that items stay in place and won't fall off
Beautiful nickel finish compliments tempered glass shelf, adding style to any bathroom

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
